item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. On Impactful AI Research (90 points | 12 comments)

13. Show HN: Velvet – Store OpenAI requests in your own DB (25 points | 16 comments)

23. Google Cache Is Fully Dead (185 points | 105 comments)
24. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (119 points | 92 comments)
25. The quest to build a telescope on the moon (119 points | 67 comments)

29. DOJ accuses Visa of monopoly that affects price of 'nearly everything’ (348 points | 287 comments)
